title: Beetroot & Carrot Khichdi Recipe for Babies, Instant Lunch for Babies
content:
Healthy and highly nutritious beetroot, carrot dal khichdi for your babies which can be made under 10 mins. This is high in protein and carb.

I made this using my rice and dal porridge mix. I added beets and carrots in this to make it more nutritious. I added garlic and asafoetida for flavor and taste. Also, it helps indigestion. This is best for lunch.

 

Beetroot & Carrot Khichdi for Babies

 

Preparation time

5 mins

 

Cook time

10 mins

 

Total time

15 mins

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 serving

 

Ingredients

Beetroot - ¼ cup grated

Carrot - ¼ cup grated

Rice & Mixed Dal Porridge Powder - 2 to 3 Tablespoon

Water - 1 cup

Garlic - 2 cloves grated

Asafoetida / Hing / Kaya Podi a pinch

Salt to taste

Pure Desi Ghee as needed

 

Instructions

Take all ingredients except salt and ghee in a saucepan and cook till the powder is cooked and the porridge is thick.

Add salt and ghee and mix well.

Spoon it into serving bowl and feed.

recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
